trans-unit.source: This tutorial demonstrates how to setup and implement Oracle Data Guard in Azure Virtual Machines environment for high availability and disaster recovery.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial demonstrates how to setup and implement Oracle Data Guard in Azure Virtual Machines environment for high availability and disaster recovery.

trans-unit.source: The tutorial focuses on one way replication for non-RAC Oracle databases.
trans-unit.target: The tutorial focuses on one way replication for non-RAC Oracle databases.

trans-unit.source: Oracle Data Guard supports data protection and disaster recovery for Oracle Database.
trans-unit.target: Oracle Data Guard supports data protection and disaster recovery for Oracle Database.

trans-unit.source: It is a simple, high-performance, drop-in solution for disaster recovery, data protection, and high availability for the entire Oracle database.
trans-unit.target: It is a simple, high-performance, drop-in solution for disaster recovery, data protection, and high availability for the entire Oracle database.
